explanation: The stage direction describes the setup of the stage, indicating the presence of a table covered in papers and an open brochure, which helps establish the scene where the action will take place. This aligns with the definition of setting, which pertains to stage description or play location.
stgdir: Le Théâtre représente une Étude de Procureur ; sur le devant est une table couverte de papiers, sur laquelle est une brochure ouverte.
